Question: On completion of his studies at Brienne in 1784, this person was admitted to the elite École Militaire in Paris.
Hints: This person ultimately chose divorce so he could remarry in search of an heir.
This person once told his brother Lucien in April 1801, "Skillful conquerors have not got entangled with priests.
The soldiers responded with, "Vive L'Empereur!" and marched with this person to Paris; Louis XVIII fled.
